/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. A white car is parked on the right side of the street, adding a touch of modern life to the scene. On the left side of the street, a bus stop can be seen, hinting at the hustle and bustle that might occur during peak hours. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
